allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add folder/area support to upload API

- Add areaId and folderId params to /api/upload endpoint
- Add API key auth to /api/sites/[siteId]/folders endpoint
- Add new /api/sites/[siteId]/areas endpoint with API key auth

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add location selector for file uploads \(v1.2.0\)

- Add Location dropdown showing Area > Folder hierarchy
- Fetch areas and folders from Files API with API key auth
- Send areaId and folderId in upload requests
- Update README documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
